International Restrictions:
*All travellers: Visitors to Burundi must get a visa to enter.
Passengers arriving in Burundi are no longer required to provide proof of a negative COVID-19 test or to book a test at Bujumbura airport upon arrival. You do not need to present proof that you have been fully vaccinated to enter Burundi. The same measures apply to vaccinated and non-vaccinated travellers.


Internal Resrictions:
*Moving around Burundi: You should avoid all large gatherings, remain vigilant at all times and follow the instructions of local authorities given security and health (COVID-19) risks. Night clubs and karaoke bars in Burundi are now open.
*Accommodation: Accommodation remains open but measures may be in place on a case by case basis.
